summary_zh: 蘋果公司（AAPL）發表了新款 Apple Watch 系列，包括 Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch SE 3 和 Apple Watch Ultra 3，並提供選購指南。
JPMorgan 重申對蘋果（AAPL）的「增持」評級，顯示 iPhone 17 的供需已達到平衡。
儘管部分市場分析師將蘋果排除在新的「七巨頭」組合之外，但蘋果仍被視為市場關注焦點，且 Jim Cramer 鼓勵投資者長期持有（Own It, Don’t Trade It）。
summary_en: Apple released its latest Apple Watch models, including the Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch SE 3, and Apple Watch Ultra 3, along with a buying guide.
JPMorgan reiterated an 'Overweight' rating for Apple (AAPL), signaling that demand and supply for the iPhone 17 have reached parity.
Despite being excluded from some analysts' new 'Magnificent Seven' groupings, Apple remains a market focus, with Jim Cramer advising investors to 'Own It, Don’t Trade It'.

summary_zh: 微軟 (MSFT) 被 Wedbush Securities 分析師 Dan Ives 點名為「2026 年前最優質的股票之一」，顯示其在市場上受到積極評價。
多篇報導將微軟列為 AI 領域的重要參與者，包括其在 AI 技術進展和應用方面的潛力，以及作為潛在的 AI 領頭股之一。
微軟被納入分析師和投資者對 2026 年 AI 趨勢的討論中，儘管 AI 交易預期會有相當大的波動性。
summary_en: Microsoft (MSFT) was highlighted by Wedbush Securities analyst Dan Ives as one of the 'Best Quality Stocks to Buy Before 2026,' indicating positive market sentiment.

Multiple reports position Microsoft as a key player in the Artificial Intelligence (AI) space, acknowledging its progress and potential in AI advancements and applications, and its consideration as a leading AI stock.
Microsoft is included in discussions by analysts and investors regarding AI trends for 2026, despite expectations of significant volatility in the AI trade.

summary_zh: Alphabet（GOOGL）在2025年底被認為是表現最佳的「七巨頭」股票之一，顯示其強勁的市場表現。
Google推出了一項前所未有的新功能，允許用戶更改其Gmail地址。
Alphabet在人工智慧（AI）領域展現顯著進展，Gemini模型市場份額顯著提升，且在量子計算領域也有佈局，同時Waymo的自動駕駛技術持續發展。
此外，Alphabet因其在AI領域的創新，包括Gemini 3的發布，受到了分析師和市場的高度關注，並被認為在AI競賽中表現出色。
summary_en: Alphabet (GOOGL) is recognized as one of the best-performing 'Magnificent Seven' stocks at the close of 2025, highlighting its strong market position.
Google has rolled out an unprecedented feature allowing users to change their Gmail addresses.

Alphabet is demonstrating significant advancements in Artificial Intelligence (AI), with notable market share gains for its Gemini model, ongoing developments in quantum computing, and continued progress in Waymo's autonomous driving technology.

Furthermore, Alphabet's AI innovations, including the release of Gemini 3, have garnered significant attention from analysts and the market, positioning the company as a strong contender in the AI race.

summary_zh: Amazon 在 2025 年底被視為「七巨頭」中表現最佳的股票之一，並被認為在 2026 年有望迎來轉機，主要受惠於其雲端運算業務和 AI 技術的進展。
儘管 Amazon 的 AI 解決方案受到關注，其廣告業務也被認為是另一項關鍵的增長動力。然而，Amazon 也暫停了在義大利的無人機送貨計畫。
Amazon 作為一家物流領導者，在零售業競爭激烈（包括與 Walmart 和 Target 相比）的情況下，其獲利能力和長期的增長潛力受到關注。
summary_en: Amazon is highlighted as a top-performing "Magnificent Seven" stock of 2025, with expectations of a strong 2026 driven by its cloud computing segment and AI advancements.
Beyond its AI solutions, Amazon's advertising business is noted as a key growth driver. However, the company has also halted its drone delivery plans in Italy.
Amazon's profitability and long-term growth potential are under scrutiny amidst intense retail competition, particularly when compared to rivals like Walmart and Target.

summary_zh: Meta Platforms (META) 在 2026 年前被 Wall Street Journal 報導為「2026 年前最值得買入的高品質股票」之一，並準備在 2026 年發布兩項新的人工智能（AI）發展。
摩根士丹利分析師將 Meta 列為他們關注的人工智能股票之一，而 Baird 則重申了對 Meta 的「跑贏大盤」評級，鼓勵投資者逢低買入。
Meta 在人工智慧領域持續發展，並被視為可能成為 2026 年首家市值達到 2 兆美元的新公司之一，同時也面臨著參議員伯尼·桑德斯對 AI 風險的擔憂。
summary_en: Meta Platforms (META) was highlighted by The Wall Street Journal as one of the 'Best Quality Stocks to Buy Before 2026' and is slated to release two new AI developments in 2026.
Meta is included in a list of AI stocks investors are watching by Morningstar analysts, and Baird reiterated an 'Outperform' rating, encouraging investors to buy the dip.

The company continues its advancements in AI and is considered a potential candidate to become the first new $2 trillion company in 2026, while also facing scrutiny from Senator Bernie Sanders regarding AI risks.

summary_zh: 儘管面臨潛在的車門安全調查以及第四季交付預測低於預期，部分分析師（如 Canaccord）仍對 Tesla 保持看漲態度，認為其為值得關注的 AI 股票。
Elon Musk 駕駛無安全員的 Robotaxi 引起關注，同時 Tesla 的自動駕駛技術被視為 2026 年「自動駕駛元年」的關鍵參與者，與 Waymo 共同推動產業發展。
Tesla 的市場地位受到中國比亞迪（BYD）的挑戰，BYD 有望在 2025 年電動車銷量上超越 Tesla，成為全球最大的電動車公司。
summary_en: Despite facing a potential door safety investigation and a fourth-quarter delivery forecast below consensus, some analysts (like Canaccord) remain bullish on Tesla, viewing it as a notable AI stock.

Elon Musk's experience with a driverless Robotaxi garners attention, positioning Tesla's autonomous driving technology as a key player for 2026, dubbed the 'year of autonomous driving', alongside Waymo.
Tesla's market position is challenged by China's BYD, which is poised to surpass Tesla in EV sales for 2025, potentially becoming the world's largest electric vehicle company.

Source: Barrons.com, Motley Fool, Morningstar Research, Insider Monkey, Reuters, Bloomberg, GlobeNewswire, Fortune, Yahoo Finance Video
Title: [AI] Microsoft Positioned Amidst AI Evolution and Market Volatility
Content:
Key Highlights:
- Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) is identified as one of the best quality stocks to consider before 2026, according to analyst Dan Ives [6](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/dan-ives-think-microsoft-corporation-182047975.html).
- Microsoft's AI innovations are noted as making significant waves, positioning it alongside Alphabet as a key player in the AI space for the next five years [13](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/70005fbb-4e53-3b1a-9d3a-076dd513dd87/4-stocks-to-hold-for-the-next.html).
- The company is recognized as a significant participant in the AI revolution, contributing to the broader market's gains driven by artificial intelligence stocks [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/45955087-4f1c-35c7-a7f4-f6b515d2f8eb/4-tech-stocks-with-more.html).
- A former Microsoft pioneer in machine teaching highlights that building AI agents is akin to assembling a basketball team rather than drafting individual players, offering a perspective on AI development [15](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/pioneered-machine-teaching-microsoft-building-140500754.html).
- Analysts anticipate a "tremendous amount of volatility" in the AI trade for 2026, a market segment where Microsoft is a notable player [16](https://finance.yahoo.com/video/expect-tremendous-amount-volatility-ai-130022550.html).

In-Depth Analysis:
Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) continues to be a focal point in discussions surrounding the artificial intelligence landscape heading into 2026. Analyst Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities has identified MSFT as a prime candidate among "Best Quality Stocks to Buy Before 2026," underscoring the company's robust standing in the market [6](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/dan-ives-think-microsoft-corporation-182047975.html). The company's advancements in AI innovation are recognized for their significant impact, placing it in the same echelon as Alphabet as a dominant force in the sector, with prospects for sustained relevance over the next five years [13](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/70005fbb-4e53-3b1a-9d3a-076dd513dd87/4-stocks-to-hold-for-the-next.html). Microsoft's broader involvement in the AI revolution is a key factor contributing to the market's overall gains, driven by the substantial performance of AI-focused stocks [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/45955087-4f1c-35c7-a7f4-f6b515d2f8eb/4-tech-stocks-with-more.html). Insights from within the company, such as the analogy comparing AI agent development to team building by a machine teaching pioneer, offer a unique perspective on the strategic approach to AI advancements [15](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/pioneered-machine-teaching-microsoft-building-140500754.html). Concurrently, market watchers are preparing for significant fluctuations in the AI sector, with analysts forecasting considerable volatility in the AI trade for the upcoming year, a dynamic in which Microsoft is expected to play a crucial role [16](https://finance.yahoo.com/video/expect-tremendous-amount-volatility-ai-130022550.html). Despite broader market trends and regulatory discussions, Microsoft's foundational role in AI development and its strategic positioning suggest continued investor attention.

Source: Motley Fool, Barrons.com, Insider Monkey, TheStreet, Business Insider, Moneywise, Reuters
Title: [AI] Meta Platforms Focuses on AI Developments and Market Performance Amidst Analyst Attention
Content:
Key Highlights:
- Meta Platforms is slated to release two new AI developments in 2026 [5](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/meta-platforms-meta-set-release-181849125.html).
- Baird reiterated an "Outperform" rating on Meta Platforms and encouraged investors to "buy the dip" [22](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/meta-meta-rated-outperform-baird-075058561.html).
- Meta Platforms is mentioned as a stock that could be the first new $2 trillion company in 2026, alongside Tesla and Broadcom [18](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/2d751d5f-fd34-3071-bd63-786e1f7111b2/prediction%3A-this-ai-stock.html).
- The company continues to dominate with its social networks while exploring AI advancements [2](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/3df571db-c680-3e94-89c9-55103008fdb7/investing-in-these-3.html).
- Meta Platforms is trading at a price point where other major tech companies have previously announced stock splits [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/cbd06434-d8cf-3328-b083-8f6c6c235e6f/the-next-stock-split-stock.html).

In-Depth Analysis:
Meta Platforms (META) is capturing significant attention as it prepares for further advancements in artificial intelligence, with plans to release two new AI developments in 2026 [5](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/meta-platforms-meta-set-release-181849125.html). This focus on AI comes as the company continues its dominance in the social networking sphere [2](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/3df571db-c680-3e94-89c9-55103008fdb7/investing-in-these-3.html). Analysts are showing continued confidence in the company's prospects. Baird recently reiterated its "Outperform" rating on Meta Platforms, advising investors to consider purchasing the stock during dips [22](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/meta-meta-rated-outperform-baird-075058561.html). Furthermore, Meta Platforms is being identified as a potential candidate to become the next $2 trillion company in 2026, a trajectory shared with other tech giants like Tesla and Broadcom [18](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/2d751d5f-fd34-3071-bd63-786e1f7111b2/prediction%3A-this-ai-stock.html). The company's current stock price also positions it at a level where significant tech peers have historically undertaken stock splits, a move that could be on the horizon for Meta [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/cbd06434-d8cf-3328-b083-8f6c6c235e6f/the-next-stock-split-stock.html). Amidst these developments, Meta Platforms remains a subject of interest for investors and analysts looking at the evolving AI landscape and market performance.

Source: Motley Fool, Benzinga, AFP, Investor's Business Daily, Yahoo Finance Video, Barchart, GOBankingRates, Insider Monkey, Fortune, Reuters, MarketBeat
Title: [AI] Tesla Navigates Competition and Technological Advancements as 2025 Concludes
Content:
Key Highlights:
- Tesla (TSLA) is positioned in 'buy areas' amidst a strong market performance nearing the end of 2025, alongside other major tech companies like Nvidia and Google [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/a4e2f064-8bac-3727-98f2-40f9aa1abcd0/dow-jones-futures-waver-with.html).
- China's BYD is reportedly poised to surpass Tesla in electric vehicle sales for 2025, marking a significant shift in global EV market leadership [3](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/chinas-byd-poised-overtake-tesla-012215791.html).
- Analysts are optimistic about 2026 being the 'year of autonomous' driving, with Tesla's robotaxi service a key focus alongside Waymo [7](https://finance.yahoo.com/video/2026-autonomous-analyst-tesla-waymo-190054918.html).
- Tesla is facing a new investigation regarding door safety, prompting discussions on how to play the TSLA stock heading into 2026 [13](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/d1d3acd7-dd98-35cf-97bf-8bc24b6c3200/as-tesla-faces-a-new.html).
- Despite near-term delivery softness, Canaccord Genuity maintains a bullish stance on Tesla and has raised its price target [23](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/canaccord-remains-bullish-tesla-tsla-074355630.html).

In-Depth Analysis:
As 2025 draws to a close, Tesla (TSLA) remains a central figure in market discussions, situated in 'buy areas' as the broader market reaches record highs [4](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/a4e2f064-8bac-3727-98f2-40f9aa1abcd0/dow-jones-futures-waver-with.html). The electric vehicle giant is facing increased competition, with Chinese automaker BYD reportedly set to overtake Tesla in global EV sales for 2025 [3](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/chinas-byd-poised-overtake-tesla-012215791.html). This development highlights the evolving landscape of the automotive industry and the growing influence of international manufacturers. On the technological front, Tesla's advancements in autonomous driving are drawing significant attention, with analysts predicting 2026 to be a pivotal year for the sector, emphasizing the company's robotaxi ambitions [7](https://finance.yahoo.com/video/2026-autonomous-analyst-tesla-waymo-190054918.html). CEO Elon Musk has also made notable claims regarding the capabilities of Tesla's driverless robotaxi [15](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/elon-musk-says-driverless-tesla-043120967.html). However, the company is not without its challenges, as it confronts a new investigation into door safety [13](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/d1d3acd7-dd98-35cf-97bf-8bc24b6c3200/as-tesla-faces-a-new.html). Despite potential headwinds such as delivery softness, financial analysts like Canaccord Genuity are maintaining a bullish outlook, even raising their price targets for the stock [23](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/canaccord-remains-bullish-tesla-tsla-074355630.html). The company's market valuation stands at $1.6 trillion, positioning it among other tech giants in terms of market capitalization [2](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/invested-5000-tesla-around-christmas-013111591.html), and some analyses consider it a potential candidate for the first new $2 trillion company in 2026 [12](https://finance.yahoo.com/m/2d751d5f-fd34-3071-bd63-786e1f7111b2/prediction%3A-this-ai-stock.html).
